subject: Releasing of Additional Performance Security against Abnormally Low bids in Existing ongoing Contracts- reg.
text: HRiv 74y RTHRfgifetasrut (Tsw5 4Rdev a RTAFf +T4, #RT TTGR) National Highways Authority of India Rrta TIa (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 71-5 Qa 6, #7-10 , #RwT, 758f @avlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TT/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Performance Security /2022 Policy Circular No. 3.1.35 /2022 dated 31st 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/CMD /PSGBG/2020 (Computer No: 46547)} Sub:: Releasing of Additional Performance Security against Abnormally Low bids in Existing ongoing Contracts MoRTH vide letter No. NH-37015/01/2022-H (Comp. No. 208778) dated 18.05.2022 has issued guidelines in consultation with Ministry of Finance on releasing of Additional Performance Security received against Abnormally Low bids in existing ongoing contracts in case substantial work as defined in these guidelines has been completed. This relaxation will be applicable till 31.03.2023 or its further orders whichever is earlier. A copy of MoRTH letter dated 18.05.2022 is attached herewith for information and compliance by all concerned. 2_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
